title: Vayne is going to need massive nerfs if Pink wards don't reveal invisible champs next season
body: That was one of the only ways to counter her late game

replies.body: How is she going to reposition without that invisibility?

> [{quoted}](name=Gamerzgodz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VtYl5iFc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-11T01:23:55.135+0000)
>
> How is she going to reposition without that invisibility?

Hmmmm I don't know... by using some sort of 2 second cooldown dash perhaps?

>
> Hmmmm I don't know... by using some sort of 2 second cooldown dash perhaps?

The invisibility is the whole reason she is able to reposition, you don't know where she will dash to.

You forgot {{item:3139}} is a thing for most of your list and there's a high chance she got some peel from her team.

I think I've mostly come to the conclusion that Scimitar is the main reason why tanks are generally not great right now. It's pretty dumb that ADCs give up nothing for the QQS effect. In previous seasons if you wanted QSS you lost a slot so buying a QQS actually had a tradeoff. Now ADCs just get a super efficient upgrade to the strongest item effect in the game. If Riot want to see tanks competitively again they need to remove or at least cripple this item.

You can even see this from which tanks are kinda playable right now. Ali's super good, his CC cannot be removed by QSS. Braum is strong, knockup on ult. Zac has a lot of knockups. Before them Grag relied entirely on displaces. Champs like Amumu or Sej don't even get looked at since an ADC can just pick up Merc and ignore their cleansable engage.

i main zac and are you kidding me? she can q out of your e easily and even if she cant, she can e you while you are in the air still.
vayne is my most hated adc to fight as him, lucian is a very distant second.

you need to wait for her to e someone, ult then as soon as she shows after her q, you e and r.

and who's fault is that you are jumping on them from places they got vision??????????????????????????????????????????????????????
oooooooooooooh right
theres a fucking giant shadow where you are landing?!!?...i dont even...are you serious?

because the vayne player is watching HER MODEL instead of the enemeis... which might and will try to shot skill shots or stuff towards her

you serious?
the attention range users (mages, adcs, etc) are paying most of the time is not on their model, but on their surroundings
that's why ganks over walls are HIGHLY EFFICIENT, we will usually react when you are in our field of vision, and if you were there for only like 1 second or half a second, most of us don't have the reflexes to insta flash away.
take into account that we ain't playing on a 7ping server like lcs people, its obvious why its efficient
I think im done speaking to you now. if you do not have the reflexes to press "q" in the 0.8 seconds you get to see that shadow, may i suggest shuffleboard instead?

a) you don't pay attention to your model
b) you somehow were paying attention to your model and notice the small shadow -> you press Q
simple right?
well, you got around 1 second or less to press q.
average human reaction time is 0.4 seconds.
vayne q has travel time
that's roughly ~0.6 seconds gone to reaction time and travel time

then there is latency, which can add to the reaction time and spell activate time. Why both? because you will notice it later and your input is taken on later.
Assuming someone has 50 ping, that's 0.1s delay.
Assuming they got 75 ping. That's 0.15 delay. And so on, you get the point.

Given all this, the "vayne" player has ~0.3 seconds to notice you incoming as zac in non LAN tournaments.
Given that you are korean in terms of reaction time, you can increase that to like 0.5 by reducing your reaction time to half.

Sry, but I rarely see adcs notice things that fast in such a short term. This includes any adc (or mage).
And that's for any elo. Fine, I never played in diamond or challanger or master. But as far as plat and below goes, I can vouch for that on euw server. So, sry, not all vayne players are gona be some korean challenger that can dodge out of zac's stuff. Even more giving his absurd hitbox

Solid players in higher rank play have that reaction time to be able to tumble out in less then half a second with extreme ease. And realistically, a full charged Zac is more along 1.5 second notice before he lands the knock up. More then enough time to react with a tumble. 

For those that are lower rank/higher ping. Well there's a reason why this game isn't balanced around them, were that the case, Vayne would be described as OP when she's really not. 

I'm silver and I can still react in time to seeing Zac's shadow appearing near me. You're really overstating how difficult it is to tumble out of it. Even if you want to argue this point further, the kicker is even if Zac lands on Vayne, which should never happen. Vayne still can condemn the Zac away from her.

after she falls down from the double knock-ups of Zac.
Vayne "technically" can also condemn Diana out of her ultimate. This has yet to happen to me in either normal or ranked. And my Elo is plat. That means AT BEST, there's only 5-7% players in the entire game who would be able to do that.

then also do the math on how much damage she takes while doing that
rejoice when you actually DO THE MATH AND SEE THE NUMBERS ;)
Vayne has other damage too nimrod. Silver bolts is just an OP ability on an already OP kit. The slut just needs to be gutted.
not tanks only lol she can 1 auto any squishy late game with her tumble.....

at 6 items u don't have a spot for {{item:2043}}  anyways, so how is that different from how it is now?
Supports :)

>  Vayne is going to need massive nerfs if Pink wards don't reveal invisible champs next season
> 
> That was one of the only ways to counter her late game

have you been playing the game this season? How do you get pink ward late game? Which slot will you use if you have 6 items?

With trinket changes that cannot detect stealth anymore surprisingly this season Vayne seems to do worst when she had way less counterplay then previous seasons and i was expecting her to have really high ban rate and win rates and pick rates but somehow it was the opposite of my expectations
Not like anyone had pink wards late game to counter her in the first place.

That's the problem with the current stealth champions.

It's too hard to balance them around their stealth, when you can counter it with a simple ward. It usually winds up being very strong when they don't have a ward, and very weak when they do. By removing the counter, you can balance the stealth and the rest of their kit knowing the stealth will always work.

Frankly she's already in need of one

the Q change turned her from a champion which revolves around her silver bolts to "If my Q crits it'll 1 shot anything below 2K health"

Though if pinks don't reveal her I'm sure (i HOPE) she has a nerf put on automatically to counter that
